sentences: Randy Montana  (n√©e Schlappi; born September 23, 1985) is an American country singer signed to Mercury Records Nashville.
The couple have one daughter Sullivan Mae Montana born February 27, 2012, and one son Gunnar West Montana born December 10, 2014.
In March 2010, Montana released his debut single "Ain't Much Left of Lovin' You," to radio.
